participant_1.background:
I decided to move to Salt Lake City to be with my girlfriend.
I am a person who is happy with my hobbies and I am not too concerned about what others think of me.
I'm a bit of a klutz but I'm comfortable with who I am and I'll do everything I can to give my child a good future.
I want to learn how to play the guitar so I can perform my favorite pop songs in front of my friends.
I'm going to see my brother this weekend to take my mind off my wife.

participant_2.background:
I get to make gummy worms all day long, which is a dream come true for me!
i don t like kids.
i just bought new hoop earrings.
i enjoy classical music.
I hunt, bike and study my way through my day, thanks to my loving family.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
Hi! I'm doing great, thanks! What about you?
I'm doing well too, thanks for asking. I'm excited to be moving to Salt Lake City soon!
That's awesome! I've always wanted to visit Salt Lake City. What are you looking forward to the most about living there?
I'm looking forward to exploring the city and meeting new people. I'm also excited to be closer to my girlfriend.
That sounds great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun in Salt Lake City.
Thanks, I'm sure I will too!
I love to play guitar and sing. I also enjoy hiking and biking.
That's cool! I love to hike and bike too.
What's your favorite type of music?
I love classical music. It's so relaxing and beautiful.
I love classical music too! It's one of my favorite genres.
That's awesome! Do you have any favorite classical composers?
I love Mozart and Beethoven. They're two of my all-time favorites.
Me too! They're both amazing composers.
Yeah, they are! I'm glad to meet someone else who loves classical music.
Me too! It's not a very popular genre, but I'm glad there are other people who enjoy it
